records.summary: Strolling with my wife in the Heights part of Houston, on a quiet and dark residential street. I had been seeing a number of horizontal
records.story: Strolling with my wife in the Heights part of Houston, on a quiet and dark residential street. I had been seeing a number of horizontal fire balls flying around from where I lived near the Medical Center, and was in the habit of looking up. There was a large opening in the canopy  between the old Live oak trees we were walking beneath, and all of a sudden I saw this huge object. It was just over the tree line, no more  than 100 feet above, and it flew directly over my head. It was the size of a house, matte black, spherical, mechanically  silent. The only sound it made was the sound of flames That we're shooting off of it, rather loudly. I actually heard the flames and looked  up just  before  it passed overhead. It was monumental, perfectly silent , and amazing to witness. it flew just overhead, and by the time I yelled at my wife to look up it had passed, and was obscured by the trees. A stunning sight. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Orange Orb/Ball near Downtown Houston.
records.story: Orange Orb/Ball near Downtown Houston I observed (with camera/have video) an orange orb/ball moving West while the wind was blowing East near downtown Houston with my naked eyes, grabbed by camera and shot about 15 minutes of video.  The object moved from East to West until it stopped exactly South of me, then proceeded North and stopped over head of me, at approximately 10,000 ft.  After recording this event, the object eventually continued moving North and disappeared.

records.summary: 4 jets circling a mysterious object
records.story: 4 jets circling a mysterious object Driving down 290 headed NW, I say 4 jets in the sky at the same time at certain points traveling in the same direction around a circular object that was stationary.   While I first thought it was a star, eventually it went away and then near the same location where a stationary line appeared that emitted a bright yellow light.  Eventually it got dark.  Could have been a star but the 4 jets in the sky at the same time seems suspicious to me.

records.summary: About  9 red glowing objects going up into night sky  formed lines, then triangles, then disappeared.
records.story: About  9 red glowing objects going up into night sky  formed lines, then triangles, then disappeared. It was near downtown around 22:23, on August 5, 2012, I looked out my window and seen 3 red glowing objects going up in a diagonal line. I then went outside to investigate.  I called my husband and son outside to witness what I was seeing. My neighbor then came outside and asked what were those objects in the sky. We pulled out our phones and began recording.  The first 3 objects by that time had formed a line straight up, then one went to the right and they disappeared. Followed by them were more objects coming up the same direction. At first we thought they were flares, but they didn’t burn like flares. They illuminated.  Three were now in the sky formed a line like the previous 3, but then formed a triangle and disappeared.  Three more did the same and they were gone. I’ve been searching the news and the web to see if anything has been reported but haven’t found anything.  So I thought I’d report it here. I and my husband have video footage on my phone. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) This is reference to a report I already submitted. I uploaded my video on you tube and here is the link: http://youtu.be/qPDd93nEXyc.  Please excuse the commentary as I was a little freaked out about what I was witnessing. ((END ADDENDUM))

records.summary: Two sets of three round lighted aircraft objects
records.story: Two sets of three round lighted aircraft objects Sighting 09/20/12  There are two half circles of three lights each in Houston:  1.  Above the Transco/Williams Tower at Loop 610 West near Richmond/Alabama. 2.  Above the Post Oak/Uptown Area at Loop 610 West and Post Oak Blvd. Details on #1. I was standing on the east side of Transco/Williams Tower and looked up at the beacon light.  I noticed a very distinct object that wasn’t moving.  I looked again about ten minutes later and the object had progressed several feet eastward and that is when I noticed the pattern of three lights. Facing west, the three objects were positioned with the first light at the 18:00 position, the second light at the 15:00 position and the third light at the 12:00 position. Details on #2. While standing in the same location, I looked northward and noticed the second set of three objects.  These lights were positioned again in the same positions of 18:00, 15:00 and 12 noon. There appeared to be more than one light on each object, possibly red and white. My question is this; are these US machines up there? Monitoring busy city areas? Or are these foreign machines up there monitoring US areas of interest? Are the UFOs and what are they monitoring?  Very strange. There were two of us that saw the same thing. Background info: college graduates, mid 40s, one male, one female, not related, US citizens

records.summary: Falling teardrop-looking light of different colors.
records.story: Falling teardrop-looking light of different colors. My brother and I were playing soccer outside at night when we saw the thing fall. We looked up, and high above we saw something shoot by quickly, out of nowhere, and vanished in a few seconds, maybey two seconds. It was fast, but we saw its shape and color. It was a long streak like a teardrop, and while it shot by, we saw it turn blue, then red. But I'm mostly reporting this just to know if anyone else in the Houston area saw it that night.

records.summary: Day Light UFO Over Katy, TX, 16:40 Central Time, Fire Ball lighter than sun materialized then disappeared.
records.story: Day Light UFO Over Katy, TX, 16:40 Central Time, Fire Ball lighter than sun materialized then disappeared. As I was driving west on I-10 before the Gessner exit, I saw a fire ball, whiter than the sun, and it was in the sky in the same direction as the sun, it came from being invisible materialized then disappeared.   The whole thing lasted less than 3 seconds.   I asked my girlfriend if she saw it, but she was not looking at the sky. so she could not see it.

records.summary: I saw 2 unidentified objects flying at night .
records.story: I saw 2 unidentified objects flying at night . I was driving North, on Montrose Boulevard, at approximately 23:20 PM . I crossed the insercetion at Westheimer , and my attention was drawn to the lights , of an incoming aircraft.  The plane's flight path was from the West of Motrose heading roughly Southeast on a Glide Path, for Hobby Airport Houston , Texas, as it's most likely destination. I was watching the inbound aircaft, which I estimate was at an altitude of around 4 or 5 thousand feet, I noticed 2 more objects flying , in parallel formation to eachother , in a direction of South to North , just West of Montrose.  They were at an estimated altitude of 10 to 15 thousand feet.  The night was partly cloudy and the stars were very visible in the background.  The objects were much larger than any star or planetary obect in the background, but far smaller than a full moon. I fairly certain on my estimations of distance and altitude.  The size noted, was maybe 1/20th the diameter of a normal full moon. One aircraft, the most easterly of the 2 , was slightly in the lead. The objects were not moving at an exceptional rate of speed.  They were steady in flight characteristics, on a straight and level flight path. Both were uniform in color, though , the color observed , was a dull reddish orange glow, pointing perpendicular to the ground. The colors and round shape of the orange glow, reminded me of the shape and color of after-burners on a jet, but not as intense. There was a dull outer ring of orange next ring was darker and center of object again a dull orange. It is possible , these were a type of vertical lift for the propulsion system of the aircraft. As I observed the objects maintain a consistent and steady flight path, the trailing object began to slow fade to black.  This did not take more than a few second.  The leading object followed in this fade to black procedure.  At that point neither object could be observed in the sky.  At no point did I ever note any lighting consistent with Civilian or Military Aircraft.  I do note that the area the objects began to fade in was clear of clouds, stars were visible, and was maybe a mile or 2 away , as the bird flies.  The entire episode did not last more than a couple of minutes . ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with this witness, and he struck us as being quite level-headed and objective in his description of his sighting.  We suspect that he is an excellent witness.  PD))

records.summary: 2 experience with unkown
records.story: 2 experience with unkown It is happen so many eons ago, I am not sure about year: something between 1982 and 1984. I didn’t think that you would be interested, but as I listened to you on Coast to Coast I understood that I should write it down. I was walking around 5am to the bus stop to get to my job and I usually took the shortest way to the bus using back door of my back yard. Back of my house was facing the bayou and across of that was just empty space (later on apartments were build there)    As I started to walk I looked at the sky and saw full moon on my left across the bayou over the empty space.  And something felt strange: moon looked reddish and was low, not up in the sky.  And then I looked to the right of me, and there was a real moon in the sky!  I suddenly was scared and run as fast as I could to the bus stop. Next morning I decided to take a long way to the bus stop (it was a different stop and it would take me 10 minutes longer, but I would by walking by houses in the neighborhood).  As I turn to one of the streets I saw a black van parked on the street in front of one of the houses and in near the van I saw 2 tall men standing and watch what I thought several children playing on the front yard; I am nearsighted so it took me sometime when I came near the children to see that it was not children, and either I blocked instantly what those beings look like or it was blocked from me.  I was terrified  from what I saw and I could not even describe it immediately when  I happened.  I started to run (in my mind I heard that they were amused my terror).  I run all the way to the bus. That is my 2 experiences which I want to report. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the dates of the sightings are approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Houston Fireball Triangle
records.story: Houston Fireball Triangle Three fireballs in triangle formation, appearing from the south, slowly drifted in a northern direction.   Each fireball seemed to act as a separate entity, and although each fireball somewhat rotated position, the triangle formation was very closely maintained.  The formation seemed to increase in elevation and slow.  Began to take video with cell phone, cell phone locked up and began making buzzing sound. The formation of fireballs seemed to stop heading in a northern direction and two of the fireballs gravitated towards one another and simultaneously zoomed out of view (out of atmosphere?)  The other lingered, moving slowly in a circular pattern, and then zoomed out of view in the same fashion. Attempted to review video of event on phone- phone states image not available.

records.summary: I saw unexplained objects not moving for about an hour, with bright lights.  ((NUFORC Note:  Jupiter and Venus.  PD))
records.story: Ok, I saw unexplained objects not moving for about an hour, with bright lights in the night’s sky over Houston on March 12, 2012. Also saw large aircrafts circling the area surrounding the objects as if they were trying to examine the objects. My son video the objects from his cell phone but he couldn’t see the aircrafts circling the objects he was in another area of the town in Houston. I, my husband and my other son saw the aircraft circling the objects in our area of Houston. I can have him send it to you. We didn't stay outside to see the objects leave it was too unbelievable and a little frighten to stay outside and watch the objects. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a sighting of Jupiter and Venus, which are very prominent in the western sky, at the time indicated by the witness.  PD)) ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) We were looking North West and it appeared to be two objects, reason I am saying two objects is because one size of the light was larger then the other light ,it could have been one large object with two very bright lights since the lights were diagonally from each other.  We could not see sharps or sizes or anything else because of the objects lights were very bright like a star light but, we knew we were not viewing stars because they were position to low from the sky, same height that you could view an airline flying in the sky.  My son's cell phone is old and he is having a problem sending the video from his cell phone to me by email or to my cell phone but I am going to take his phone to the cell phone company to see if they can upload it to my email ((END ADDENDUM))

records.summary: It took this long to find  wedsite  of the probe I saw in story above.
records.story: It took this long to find  wedsite  of the probe I saw in story above. UFO PROB?  FBI?  or CIA? or DOD..? 27 AUG 08 - I was leaving work around 12:25 pm, 27 Aug 08, Ellington Fld, Houston, TX-- I was going home to evacuating from hurricane Gustav. I notice the object, as I was at the top of I-45 over pass going south towards Pearland, TX.  I slowed down to get a closer looked at this object- it was suspended 12’ to 14’ above Dixie Farm Rd.  I looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from, but nothing, it was stationary in sky on its own.   I drove under it and kept going.  I looked in my rear view mirror and it was still there, I know, I was not the only one that saw this object. The sky was clear –‘Blue Bird Day”, something came over me- (Traumatized), I carry a camera with me all the time, which, I use with my job.  It’s funny; I never thought about stopping and calling 911 or take a photo of the object. When, I first saw this object, it looked like a surveillance probe; cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 3 to 4 feet in length, approx 10 inches in diameter.    I heard about UFO Probes before, when, I got home I told my wife about what I had saw.   The sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo… I called my brother-n-law and told him what I had seen.   He said he saw something like this on Discovery Channel... that the FBI and CIA...have. The object was stationary in a vertical stance and never moved-NO NOISE- cylinder with dark windows around the top, the object was 3 to 4 feet in length, approx 18” inches in diameter.  This photo is the area where the probe was seen and the photo of the probe is one that I made on Photo-shop to show what I saw.  This is not the original photo of the probe…but it is of the location.  Here is the website of probe I saw…    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6cEyelBhjJ8

records.summary: Red/orange fireballs in Houston sky.
records.story: Red/orange fireballs in Houston sky While sitting outside around our pool at about 9:30 pm, we witnessed 8-12 red/orange balls in the southern sky on the horizon. they were traveling in a north west direction at a fairly high rate of speed.  As each reached about the same spot in the sky, they disappeared into a cloud.  They were in a line, but not a perfect line and they were random distances between them.

records.summary: Falling light then vanished.
records.story: Falling light then vanished My wife in I were drawn to the sky by thousands of birds flying above our apartment in some migratory pattern.  I ran to get my binoculars for a better look at the birds but when I got back outside, I immediately noticed a strange hovering light in the distance. To the naked eye it was an indistinguishable cylindrical light that appeared to be slowly falling from the sky.  Through the binoculars it had a more defined rigid shape that resembled a crescent moon with peak in its middle.  It fell for a minute or so then was gone from sight.  Almost immediately after it vanished a helicopter flew overhead in the direction of the sighting. My wife and both witnessed it and agreed that it was one of the most bizarre unexplainable objects we had ever seen. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Satellite that behaved very unsatellitish.  ((NUFORC Note:  Report from aviation mechanic.  PD))
records.story: A satellite that behaved very unsatellitish I was born and raised in Houston, Texas I am 57 and the first 7 years of my life we lived off the approach to Hobby airport and also Ellington was a very active Air Force base in those days.  We moved to the north side of the city just about 5 to 6 miles south of what became Houston Intercontinental Airport now named Bush.    When I was about 18 or 19, I can’t remember the exact date but I believe the summer of 1973 or 74 a high school buddy and myself were out in the drive way at my next door neighbor looking up at the stars it was a clear night.  It was about an hour or maybe two after sundown.  We took note of a bright light about the size of a star.  Noting that there were no strobes, we figure it to be a satellite.  The house we were at is north of downtown Houston off US 59 at E. Mt Houston east about 2 miles from the 59.  We at first thought it to be Skylab, but noting it was moving from the south heading north and the news media said Skylab would be in a east west travel we figured it a weather satellite.  That worked for us up until it speeded up greatly.  It then went into about 4 or 5 loops then back and forth through the loops it just made and straight up and disappeared into the blackness of space. Total time of sighting was about 5 to 7 seconds from first sighting until it left our sight.  It streaked so fast there was the impression of a light trail.  As it was doing its maneuvers it would go bright to dim giving me the impression of a shape like a coin flashing in the bright sun light.  If it was a disk then at that altitude it had to be huge and it had to have travel hundreds of miles in a matter of seconds.  That date was over 40 years ago but I can still see it, it shook my buddy and my self up.  The first person we tried to tell was my Uncle who snickered at us.  We both decided not to tell anyone.  I have through my life but to a select few.  I have included it in a book I wrote on the subject.  I am by trade a Aircraft mechanic. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: orange globe, closup
records.story: orange globe, closup saw a very intense orange ball, traveling almost exactly north to south. was an orange ball, and as it traveled by me, it came into focus at approx 15 degrees until approx 240 degrees. during that period it became a box.  looked as a fish tank, the edges hightlighted.  inside the box, was a teardrop shape same brilliant orange color.  when i first relayed to my family, i said it was a teardrop.  but it comes in my dreams every few days, and what i get from the dreams is, the leading edge of the teardrop was sculptured.  two curved edges on leading edge, and at the top of teardrop, a harder image,  but never see it clearly.  the woman across the street owns a janitorial service, and after it past the point when it was clear to me, they arrived, i called to them to look. she said she saw an orange orb, and told me several of her employees saw it too. also, my son's house, where i was in the driveway, is on the outbound path from houston intercontinental airport! , and there was a plane at approx 30 deg in the background.  if you want further info, i would be happy to provide a rough sketch, and further info..as for distance, i am old, but with thumd fully extended, approx, 1 1/2 the size of my thumb.

records.summary: Pictures:  3 bright lights at first the were moving slowly
records.story: I have a couple pictures to prove what I seen I seen 3 bright lights at first the were moving slowly I was able to pull out my phone to get pictures of it then I took off really fast I followed it park in a parking lot zoomed in and try to take better pictures but then one light shot off to the left then one to the right and the last just remained flying slowing to make it seem like 3 planes but my pictures show it couldn't have been 3 different air craft just one

records.summary: While watching the Super Moon one craft appeared in sky and went to a point in the high southern sky and disapeared at a certain point
records.story: While watching the Super Moon one craft appeared in sky and went to a point in the high southern sky and disapeared at a certain point in the sky and another appeared in the same place in the same point that the first one did and traveled to that same point where the other one did and also disapeared at the same point.   Moving about 60 mph from south to north.  Appeared to be balls of fire/orange of light.   Both were seam in sky for about 20 seconds. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Saw colorful lights on these 2 objects that just hovered between my house and a neighbors that flew off into the distance.
records.story: Saw colorful lights on these 2 objects that just hovered between my house and a neighbors that flew off into the distance. I got home about a little after 9 pm.  I left my phone in my car so I went back outside to get it.  Not sure why I looked up but when I did.  I saw this object with  lights  hovering in place and then going far into the distance.  I stared at it for awhile as it continued to go into the distance.  I then called  a friend of mine to come ouside that lives with me to see if she could see the same as what I was seeing and she did.  As we were looking at the 1st one.  Another came from the left side and then directly in front of us and hovered again as the other did and continued in the distance with the same lights.  The lights were red, white and green and it appeared to have a long shape from left to right or thats how it appeared.  It was dark already so all I saw was the shape of the lights in a line.  The lights were in a line but from right to left like maybe 5 or 6 lights that faced us. We stared for awhile to make sure it was not a helicopter or plane and it was! not.  The objects appeared between my house and a neighbors house.  No other objects or lights in sight except for the 2 objects we saw.  The objects did not make any noises. Nor did they dart or zip away.  No wobbling. Just flew the same as a plane or helicopter would but was not either one.  What made it different was that they it hovered in place and moved slowly like they wanted us to see them.  I heard no plane sounds nor the sound of the helicopter wings when a helicopter is staying in place.  Nothing could be heard.  This was my sighting.Not sure what it was but it was  no plane or helicpter or jet I have ever seen.  I live close by to Ellington Airforce base and Hobby airport and I am use to seeing planes,jets and helicopters that is not what it was that night.  I went in as the last one was going into the distance.  Went inside to call another witness to come outside withing sec or a min.  When we came out it was gone.

records.summary: Large qrange/red circle appeares and disappears in the Houston sky.
records.story: Large qrange/red circle appeares and disappears in the Houston sky We were at an outdoor concert in Houston, close to the medical center.  There were EMS helicopters flying all night and we were in a flight path for Hobby Airport.   A large orange/red circle/orb appeared in the sky, must have been (guessing) 4-5 miles away.  It was larger than any star or aircraft that were closer.  It seemed to float for several minutes and then got smaller like it was moving away from us and did this very quickly.   All of a sudden it was back in a different spot and did the same thing.  It appeared a third time but this time it moved up and down and then got smaller like it was moving away from us at a very rapid rate much faster than of the airplanes in the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Yellowish /Orange object falling from the sky then changing direction.
records.story: Yellowish /Orange object falling from the sky then changing direction I noticed a very bright object falling straight down for approximately 30secs then it changed direction and traveled west.  Seconds behind it was a jet that seemed to be following it.  The sky was extremely clear.  This is not something I have ever seen before. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Photographed, recognized after the fact.
records.story: Photographed, recognized after the fact... While taking 3D stereo pictures of clouds (with 1 camera) i  captured an image of 3 objects in the sky that are between the clouds and camera (artifacts not present in three other pictures at almost the same place, time)

records.summary: Red light and circular shape.
records.story: Red light and circular shape. A hard to see shape around a red light. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: A flash of green light, fire trail in the sky and no reports on the news of a plane exploding, etc.
records.story: A flash of green light, fire trail in the sky and no reports on the news of a plane exploding, etc. Around 6:30 A.M. the wife and I were walking our dogs in the backyard.  I was talking to my wife who was nearly twenty feet away from me.  A flash of green light hit the backyard and my wife looked up and saw a yellow trail that might have been fire.  (She says like the back to the future trail left by the car).  Bright trail that slowly faded away.  At the same time the yard lit up, I was looking for cars, there were none.  There were no sounds.

records.summary: 2/13/2013    19:20  tx  5 minutes    satellite looking object with crazy turns
records.story: 2/13/2013    19:20  tx  5 minutes    satellite looking object with crazy turns A simple satellite looking object.  The same as you would look up and see a satellite flying that i have seen a hundred times before except it flew west to east then turning south for a minute the back east for a minute the southeast and curving back to north east until it was gone out of view.  This took place not in a small part of the sky it was the whole sky well over 100,000 feet and way too fast.   I am a faa certified mechanic and know planes don't fly that high and fast and satellites don't change course like this.

We were "walking back home."  The moon was so brilliant so we stopped to see it, looking at it.  We stood there and seconds w We were " walking back home" the moon was so brilliant so we stopped to see it, looking at it.  We stood there and seconds we saw this UFO!  Very large TRIANGLE shaped" no sound!  It came near ..  We ducked into a ditch....  We looked up and the UFO was moving slow back up and then left "  Was dark black triangle. My sister saw some kind of lights on the right side--I didn't see the lights ..  I'll  never" never" Forget that night""...  We ran home .. We told mom& dad ..  We did't know who to call .. So we called a radio station... "  The UFO was coming around the moon" we said what is that?  My sis said I don't know?  Like I said "seconds we were looking at a UFO "! … ((NUFORC Note:  Source elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I awoke to find a Grey crawling on my bed.
records.story: I awoke to find a Grey crawling on my bed. I was awakened by something crawling on our waterbed, causing waves, and found what I later learned was a Grey on the foot of the bed.  It was looking straight at me, leaning on its right hand, its left hand (four fingers) stretched out towards me.  It looked to be about four feet in height with long, lean fingers and big, black, bulging eyes, two tiny slits for a nose and a small slit for a mouth. Its head was larger in the cranium, the neck spindly.  I could tell it was reading my mind and since I was pregnant, I was really afraid.  I immediately screamed and jumped out of bed, running into the living room where my husband was watching television.  I've not seen another one of those since.  Incidentally, we were living about ten miles away from the Johnson Space Center. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the incident is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Small white ball over Houston.
records.story: Small white ball over Houston. This object was observed while I was closing my gate in front of my home just outside of downtown, normally I gaze at the stars and this one star did stand out this time,  It was just of feeling that this star just didn't belong there.  Suddenly this star moves in an Z-Pattern and just disappears! I had to blink and do all sorts of things to make sure I was really seeing this.  Basically, this object looked more like solid light like planet,  it was just small bright circle disguised as a star/planet!

records.summary: Silver disc on the right of me and then golden disc on the left of me.
records.story: Silver disc on the right of me and then golden disc on the left of me I just left my apartment to walk my dog and noticed some big silver disk high in the sky on the right of me, first I was thinking that it was a plane, but I noticed that it didn't move… After a while I stopped looking at the sky: had to pay attention to my dog, as she went about her business and when I finally looked back on the sky, it was gone.  I continued walking and after a couple of minutes looking around the sky, I noticed that what I assumed the same disk on the left of me, but very far away and this time it was thinner and had a golden-orange color.   Another woman was passing us by and walking her dog and I asked her opinion on the disk, first she said that it is probably a plane, but after looking at it for a few seconds she agreed that it cannot be plane, because it was just sitting there.  After that my dog decided, that she wanted to go home and we turned around and left.

records.summary: Round bright light.
records.story: Round bright light. This was taken by a co-worker on way home from work in Houston Texas on Beltway 8 two weeks ago.  He did not see the round bright object when he took the picture because he was driving at the time and only pointed and clicked twice.  What made him take the picture was the round cigar shape cloud in the upper left of the picture because it pierced the cloud in the center of the picture.   This picture was taken with an I Pad while he drove.  This was about 5:30 PM during Daylight Savings Time.   Picture on right was first picture and the left was the second picture taken.  The sun was to the bottom left of the picture and this was taken pointing to the West.  The other interesting thing about the bright object is that it has a contrail behind it so you can’t say it’s the sun reflecting off the I Pad lens.  He didn’t notice the bright object until he showed his wife the pictures later.  (I will submit the 2 pictures) taken

records.summary: Yellow & blinking green; then solid green and red. Hovered; fast vertical & horizontal up and downs, turns and arches complex maneuvers
records.story: Yellow & blinking green; then solid green and red. Hovered; fast vertical & horizontal up and downs, turns and arches complex maneuvers While enjoying the evening air, my girlfriend and I observed what appeared to simply be a commercial airliner making its final approach to Houston - until it stopped and hovered at an altitude of at least 1500 feet.  It was mostly cloudy at the time.  At first the object was a whitish-yellow light like a plane with also a blinking green light.  It later changed to non-blinking green and red lights only, arranged horizontally.  We were looking due west. As experienced birdwatchers,  I got our binoculars for a better look.  It moved more quickly, complexly and unexpectedly than any aircraft I've ever seen.  It dropped and ascended vertically several times, very, very fast.  It moved back and forth horizontally very fast and made several complex turning and arching maneuvers as well.  My girlfriend suspected we might be seeing a "toy" remote controlled aircraft.  I didn't think so.  Who would be out on a cloudy night like this in the middle of the week in a residential neighborhood flying planes?  It made no sound.  My girlfriend has worked for a major corporation for 25 years.  I'm employed in the healthcare industry.

records.summary: Bright mutlicolored moving light in the sky.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Venus??  PD))
records.story: bright mutlicolored moving light in the sky. I go to my community park called Magnum, and I have been noticing these weird lights in the sky.  There is this one bright light that appears in the sky every other night.  I have a feeling it is not a plane or a star because this light tends to move a lot.  It  brights up so bright, that looks like it could be the northern star.  Then all of a sudden the lights get really dim then seconds later it gets really bright, sometimes it turns blue other people have seen this.  It kind of looks like if it has lights on it turning around in circles.  I really have to idea what it could be and I am determined to find out what the bright moving light really is.  About 4 days ago approximately around 8:00 pm , above a tall tree there was this big ball of light that looked like it was falling from the sky but it looked so close.  My boyfriend was with me and as soon as I saw it I told him to look because I wanted to make sure I wasn't seeing anything.  When it appeared it looked as if it was a huge shooting star but couldn't have been because after I seen the big bright light that it flashed it disappeared that's when I told my boyfriend and when he looked up he saw it brighten up again right  when it was passing the tree that I had seen it above.  This isn't the first time I have experienced sightings of weird, strange lights in the sky.    I just really would like for others to know that theres unexplainable lights in the sky.  Whenever I get the chance I will make sure I record or take pictures to prove what I am seeing. ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Venus??  PD))

records.summary: Two sets of lights in the night sky.
records.story: Two sets of lights in the night sky I arrived home from work at about 12:45 am on 11-7-2013.  As usual I looked above my house and saw some stars in the sky, due to light pollution it is difficult see any but the brightest stars in the night sky.   When I looked up I some some movement in the sky, I thought it was an aircraft since I do see many commercial jets flying over my house at all hours of the day, but there were no flashing lights and the lights were barely visible.  Normally when aircraft fly over the house they fly in a north-south pattern, these lights were moving west to east which was unusual.   The lights were in a triangular shaped formation, it looked to be about seven to nine lights flying in the sky.  The lights moved slowly across the sky, within about 7 seconds they moved behind the tree in my front yard and then disappeared from my vision. 	I was trying to locate the lights again and make sense of what I had seen when my vision again moved above the house to look at the stars in the city night sky.  I then saw another light, this one singular, move from south to north in the sky above my house.  Both of these lights were noticed in the direction of the Orion constellation.

records.summary: Bright blue orb shot fast across the sky. No fade, no trail, no sound.
records.story: Bright blue orb shot fast across the sky.  No fade, no trail, no sound. Bright blue orb shot across the sky as fast as a meteor.  There was no sound, it was about as high up as a helicopter.   The center was a perfect blue circle with a lighter blue halo from the light around it.  There was no trail or fade.  It just kept going until I couldn't see beyond the buildings.

records.summary: Purple light hovering over field for over 2 hours.
records.story: Purple light hovering over field for over 2 hours. There was a a  light which changed from a fluorescent purple to a reddish hue to a soft white, hovering above the field surrounded by I-45, Beamer Rd, Clear Lake City Blvd., and Dixie Farm Road.   It was much too tall to be a tower.  I believe the field there is owned by an oil company,  I think Exxon.  There has been a lot of activity there recently.   I wonder if this light was from a drone. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Neon wavy streak of light. 2 witnesses. In Mississippi.
records.story: Neon wavy streak of light. 2 witnesses. In Mississippi. My 18 year old daughter and I were driving on HWY 8, headed east right at the Calhoun/Chickasaw County line.  We noticed a glowing (silver-ish) ball that was going back and forth from one ball to two balls.  Connected like Mickey Mouse ears.  It was just above the tree line.  Hovering.  After about 45 seconds, it disappeared.   Then about 20 seconds later a blinding neon light was coming straight at us.  At first, it looked like headlights.  But it was so bright that it lit up everything like looking through infrared glasses.  It was greenish blue waves that looked hot.  Like how the highway looks on a extremely hot day- kinda wavy.  This light shot straight through my car and passed by the passenger side window.   When I turned to look, everything in the background - the field - the trees were lit up.  And then it was gone.  It happened so fast that I didn't realize I had slammed on my brakes.  An 18 wheeler must have seen it too because he was stopped dead still on the highway too. The reason I'm posting this now is due to my daughter's nightmares.  About a month ago she started having dreams about the incident.  She won't go into detail about them but she has slept with me every night since.  I'm not sure why it started 5 months after we saw this, but she is terrified.  This isn't normal behavior for her.

records.summary: Observed slow moving orange ball/orb in southern sky, approximately over downtown Houston, appearing in a slow trajectory to the east/s
records.story: Observed slow moving orange ball/orb in southern sky, approximately over downtown Houston, appearing in a slow trajectory to the east/southeast.   Appeared to be under cloud cover for majority of time, disappeared for for about 15 seconds, then reappeared.   Lasted about 3-5 mins then disappeared.

records.summary: 3 lights in triangle form revolving around each other.
records.story: 3 lights in triangle form revolving around each other While looking at the sky that night, three lights in triangle form revolving around each other came from the south, when it got over head it started a large circle and when it completed the turn it climbed out at a very steep angle until out of sight. On approach the craft was low with no sound, it was low enough to see the intensity of the lights but the craft itself was hidden by the brightness of the lights.

records.summary: Shooting ticket type of craft, high in the night sky, which seemed to take off like a sci fi space ship going into light speed.
records.story: shooting ticket type of craft, high in the night sky, which seemed to take off like a sci fi space ship going into light speed I was smoking a cigarette in the parking lot of my apartment complex.  I had just gotten home from work.  I gazed at the night sky. I was looking at all of the stars.  And instantly I saw what looked like a rocket flash from a high altitude and shoot horizontally across the sky.  It went from left to right.   What shocked me was that it didn't fall out shot at an angle.  This thing went in a perfectly horizontal line for about 2 seconds before vanishing. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the event is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Unidentified object seen above rainbow in Texas.
records.story: Unidentified object seen above rainbow in Texas On November 11, 2013, at 12:09 PM, while taking pictures outside of a rainbow, I discovered something strange on the picture.   It is a circle of lights 9 (nine) in all with one being longer that the others.

records.summary: Four silent triangular shaped UFOs spotted flying in formation over central Houston.
records.story: Four silent triangular shaped UFOs spotted flying in formation over central Houston. While looking up into the night sky, I spotted 4 triangular aircraft moving across the Houston sky.  They were flying in a V shaped missing man formation. The craft were moving fairly fast in a straight line and at a consistent speed.  They were silent and no lights were observed.  The underside of the craft were illuminated by the night light pollution from the city. Altitude estimation 5-10K feet.  Cruising speed unknown, but moving much faster than typical commercial aircraft on approach to Hobby Airport. The craft were black, with a metallic underside - hence the reflection from the city lights. Due to my limited field of vision, I only had a short window to observe (5 seconds). I am a Houston resident.  A professional with a lot of experience flying/traveling and observing aircraft. Unfortunately no pictures/videos were taken.

records.summary: Three lights blue/green red and white flying in a triangle pattern around my neighborhood for an hour. Shape is sphere like
records.story: Three lights blue/green red and white flying in a triangle pattern around my neighborhood for an hour. Shape is sphere like I was on my balcony smoking a cigarette when these bright blue, red, and white lights appeared.  I took video.  The object made noise kinda loud and made a triangle like pattern around my neighborhood and is currently flying around still.  It sounds like it might be running out of fuel.  Keeps making a sound like a plane trying to take flight.  Object looked sphere like and like a plane on its side.

records.summary: Object flies strait down and turns is lights off.
records.story: Object flies strait down and turns is lights off. My friend and I were driving to dinner and we saw something that looked like a fireball falling strait down or of the sky. We thought it was a meteor until it slowed and two lights appeared as if it had wing lights, like a plane.  Then it blinked and disappeared. Planes don't fly strait down.  There was no sound.  No boom,  and no flash of light or explosion. It was as if it turned is lights off to avoid being tracked to a landing zone.

records.summary: Large sphere shaped light.  The sphere was the light source.
records.story: Large sphere shaped light.  The sphere was the light source. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) The siting was at a Copper Mine, 120 km from Houston BC.  I had just stopped for my last coffee.  The night was bright because of the moon overhead.  High, thin clouds.   I saw a haul truck cresting the hill with its headlights on.  Behind and above that haul truck was what looked like a very large light falling from the sky.  It was a sphere in shape and very bright.  It was falling at about a 45 degree angle.   I was thinking there was gonna be a loud crash.  Maybe this was a plane or something.  It was only a short distance from the ground, maybe 100 feet.  It disappeared behind a large stockpile.  The light object was about the size of two haul trucks.  There were four other people who saw this from all sides.  The object passed over a large roadway we call tmf2.  Crossed a water area and went just over the hill.  There it disappeared.   No crash, no fire, just disappeared.  It was a solid light with no tail or anything following it and no noise of any kind.   If you have any idea what it was, please let me know.  I am so sure of what I saw as well as confirmation from the other eye witnesses.

records.summary: Orange lights in the night sky in a formation.
records.story: Orange lights in the night sky in a formation. On September 27, 2014 at approximately 8:15 pm I and my parents witnessed orange lights in the night sky.  These are exactly like the ones that have been reported in different parts of the world. We witnessed these lights on Barker Cypress Rd located in Houston TX 77084. We are in shock.  There were originally 3 lights in an L formation then after 20 seconds about 20 orange lights appeared.  They were in the sky moving for about 2 minutes then they just completely disappeared.  These Lights were large. We were and are in shock. The whole process took about 4 minutes.  We stopped the car at the edge of the street and tried to take photos but our phones would not capture them. We are perplexed by these orange lights.  They cannot be planes since they were silent and completely disappeared plus the huge number just would not make sense. I hope this is helpful with any studies or anything in particular. The unknown is quite frightening but awfully interesting. We have! 1 blurry image.

records.summary: Blue light in the sky appears and vanishes instantly.
records.story: Blue light in the sky appears and vanishes instantly. I was with some friends hanging out in my truck just parked, we were talking about what we did that day when I heard a huge "BANG" noise.   At the same time that I heard the noise I saw a huge blue light in the shape of a circle.  It was as if it were an explosion, starting from the center, it expanded outwards and then back to the center.   All the lights in the street had turned off including my dashboard on the truck.  That's when I knew something was wrong.   I was in so much shock, I asked my friends if they saw it.  It was four of us and only one other had seen it along with me.  That's when I knew it wasn't a joke and what I saw was real.  It was far up in the sky which is why I know it had something to do with UFO's and wasn't anything caused by humans.

records.summary: Observed very bright  orange lights moving at the same altitude across the sky at normal aircraft speeds till they quickly faded.
records.story: Observed very bright  orange lights moving at the same altitude across the sky at normal aircraft speeds till they quickly faded. I live on a suburb on the northwest  side of Houston known as the Bear Creek area. I was doing a little cleanup up in my back yard at about 7:30PM this evening and a bright orange light caught my attention as it was approaching from the west in a direction that I usually observe airlines as they pass overhead to land at Houston Intercontinental Airport.  It began to curve to the north and a second orange light appeared paralleling it a little further to the west. These were no ordinary craft.  They were much brighter that the landing lights that we often see on aircraft.  They were solid without any blinking or pulsing normally associated with known aircraft.  They were a color orange that was almost as intense as looking at a welding arc with almost the same sort of sharpness.  Very orange.  The first thing I thought of was all the reports of the orange fireballs that many people have been sighting lately.  These were definitely self directed. Piloted!  They were moving about as fast as a normal aircraft.  I would estimate that they were at about 3 to 4 thousand feet in altitude.  They appeared to be roughly 500 ft apart. They continued to head in a northwesterly direction at about the same altitude paralleling each other  when another one came into view trailing behind the more westerly one at roughly the same distance. They were in a rough 90 degree pattern all moving in the same direction.  All of this transpired within approximately 30 seconds.  At this time I rushed to call my wife and 18 year old son  to see this. They came out quickly to observe what I was seeing and at that time another light appeared further back and  more to the west. At  maybe 800 ft. further back. As we observed all 4 lights they continued to move in a northern direction and began to fade out one by one. They remained the same brightness till within the last 15 seconds or so when they began to fade and then totally disappear. All of this transpired within about 3 minutes before they were totally gone. They all appeared to remain at about the same altitude and speed the entire time. There was no sound heard by any of us. I attempted to bring out a camera to photograph them, however they were to far away to capture them by the time I was able to retrieve one.  I am 58 years old. My father was in the Air Force for 18 years of my life and I have lived on and around many Air Force bases in the U. S. and in Europe. I am very familiar with many different aircraft and the required lighting that they display. These were not at all “normal” aircraft.  I can also state that my wife, my son and myself have all seen other unexplained craft in the sky at various times in the past, with some that were defiantly not terrestrial. These were some of the most unusual we have ever seen.

records.summary: Looked up at stars approximately 11:30 p.m. while in backyard with dogs. Saw yellow-orange ember-like crafts move swiftly in a more or
records.story: Looked up at stars approximately 11:30 p.m. while in backyard with dogs.  Saw yellow-orange ember-like crafts move swiftly in a more or less-straight line right over my roof headed southwest past the row of houses. Moved fairly quickly.  Some grouped together while others trailed behind. At least twice the size of airplane lights at night. I had a close up view.  They were silent.  They kept coming, so I counted 22-plus. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a black triangular object for 3 seconds pass behind a small cloud never to re-appear.
records.story: I saw a black triangular object for 3 seconds pass behind a small cloud never to reappear I was playing basketball with  my son on our driveway, back by the garage, at around 7:55 pm, when my attention caught this black triangular object in the southern sky, not overhead and not on the horizon, but in the middle but more overhead.   I saw the black triangular object with three lights at each point for no longer than 3 seconds.  It was rather large, perhaps the size of the moon and  a small cloud was in its path.  It passed behind the small cloud, and I could see the lights become covered by the small cloud, but when I expected the object to reappear after passing over the small cloud, it did not reappear.   Also, the vector movement of the triangular object  in a straight line was not related to one point moving forward or one side moving forward.  When the object disappeared, I also noticed that the small cloud developed and became somewhat thicker.  There was no opportunity to visually record the event as it happened so quickly.   I have never witnessed any thing like this before.

records.summary: Four aircraft circle like vultures then shoot off at great speeds.
records.story: Four aircraft circle like vultures then shoot off at great speeds I was watching a plane dump out a chemtrail when I noticed what looked like four "vultures" very high up in the sky.  They were at the very least 4000 ft in the air, yet their shape was quite visible, and unusually large.   They made unusually quick circles for several minutes, then I finally decided to try and film them with my iPhone; and as if it was scripted I kid you not they stopped circling and shot off at an insanely fast speed, one by one.   Of course the noon sun made it impossible to capture via the iPhone 5s, but my eyes (shaded by raybans) saw everything in 20/20 vision.  I wouldn't waste our time with a fairy tale, this was a unique event.

records.summary: At the corner of South Main and Hillcroft, my mother, sister and I went to a stable to feed our horse. I was 9 years old.
records.story: At the corner of South Main and Hillcroft, my mother, sister and I went to a stable to feed our horse.  I was 9 years old.   When we got out of the car we saw the craft.  It was about the size of a house, stationary about 50 feet above the ground.  It was round, sort of like a typical flying saucer, with small round windows on the top portion.  It was curved on top and flat on the bottom.  There were red and blue lights on the sides and underneath it was a very bright intense white light shining down on the trees and the pasture.   This property had stables on each side, the left and the right, and trees with an open area in the middle.  Beyond the trees there was a pasture about the size of a football field.  The craft was at the edge of the pasture.   I don't remember a sound.   Cars were stopped along Main Street.

records.summary: While walking subdivision park we saw 4 white light objects,1stayed stationary, 3moved in a > formation,then turn L,then back flat -
records.story: While walking subdivision park we saw 4 white light objects, 1stayed stationary, 3 moved in a > formation, then turn L,then back flat ---.

records.summary: White disc with shiny top moving west from 77095 zip code.
records.story: White disc with shiny top moving west from 77095 zip code. I was outside in the backyard with my sister's two dogs and and was cleaning up and sometimes looking at the sky.  There seemed to be a lot of contrails out which may or may not have been chemtrails.   I saw movement and looked up and saw a white disc flying from right above me toward the west.  I felt for my own protection I should rebuke it so I commanded it to go away in Jesus' name.   It continued to move slowly and silently west.  It was below the clouds and looked as it moved away like it might have a shiny top.  It disappeared behind a cloud further away and I went inside with the dogs because I was too concerned about having been seen to want to be outside. There was a small plane (not a big jet) that was flying north that was much lower and closer but I had no reason to think the two were associated.

records.summary: Cluster formation of glowing orange balls in the sky.
records.story: Cluster formation of glowing orange balls in the sky The details:  Houston, TX, January 17, 2015, between the hours of 20:00 and 20:15.  Residential area, close to one of the major freeways.   Huge line of glowing orange balls, light is pleasant, not very bright.  Lower end of the line starting on the west and climbing upwards towards the east.   Line consisted of "clusters", resembling birds' flying triangles.  One small "cluster" was placed a bit further south-east.   Altogether they were close to 100 lights.  They never moved, just set there suspended in the air, then just disappeared. There was also a light of a plane passing by, which in comparison to these lights was way smaller. Please let me know if you need any more info, I can still "see" it in my mind. Thanks you so much!

records.summary: Orb in the sky.
records.story: Orb in the sky. I was driving home from my night shift at the Houston Chronicle, around 1 a.m.  I was on Interstate 10 right where it intersects 610, the night sky was clear, the Houston air disgustingly sick and muggy as usual.  Where those two highways intersect, there is an area of commerce called the Marq’E. While driving, I saw a glowing light in the sky.  The light was neon-green ish in color and nothing else around it. It was more of an orb; the shape resembled a low-hanging star, but there’s no way a star would appear this low.  It was hard to judge exactly how high up in the sky this orb was, and I wasn’t in the position to stop my vehicle to better gauge its positioning from the highway.   Houston drives are horrible, so, all I could do was stare in awe and wonder.  The orb had a luminous glow around it, as the clear Houston sky that held it, showed some of the green rays permeating from it.  Have you ever been on your back in the grass at night just staring up at the sky and admiring the stars?  This is what this orb reminded me of, star gazing.  I gazed, while avoiding not crashing, almost making eye contact with the light.  And then, just like that in the blink of an eye, the orb shot downward, out of view disappearing. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Airplane look- two red lights- flying- stopped in mid-air for 14 seconds- then came straight down rapidly
records.story: Airplane look- two red lights- flying- stopped in mid-air for 14 seconds- then came straight down rapidly Very strange    Object appeared moving East to West at something close to normal plane speed in Eastern sky.  The reason I noticed it was that it had only two red lights--not the normal red, white and green seen on airplanes.   Then it stopped- just plain stopped- for maybe 10 to 15 seconds- then began a rapid descent straight down- It wasn't too far from me- perhaps anywhere from 1 to 5 miles East of my location- the Spring Branch area of Houston- which is approximately 12 miles west of downtown.   I was glad it wasn't closer because it may have been out to take someone or something.  It disappeared behind the tree horizon and did not reappear.  I'm sorry but did not have camera with me.  It did not come down like a helicopter- but it motored straight down- weird.  Actual shape was not evident but similar to plane. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Downtown Houston, Texas, 3 people witnessed a quick oval flash through the sky at a fast speed.
records.story: Downtown Houston, Texas, 3 people witnessed a quick oval flash through the sky at a fast speed. st saw my first ufo.  It was so fast.  There is heavy cloud coverage and contrails are heavy here in Houston.  I am downtown.  I am.. just Shocked.  It was just like a quarter second of lights through the clouds.  2 guys in front of me saw it too.  Compass pointing south.  About 45 degrees from horizon line.   Saw it around 945pm central. Located at east down warehouse in downtown Houston  d. I honestly thought it was a plane at first.   We have lots of air traffic here, but it was too big and the lights were different.   It could have just been the right time right place for a cloud to open up to the meteor that skid across only a small patch of clouds  It was fast.  It felt close, like in a low cloud.  It was so fast.  The lights seemed out of this world.   They are a blur in my memory now, but they were amazing from what I remember

records.summary: A report/video of 7 minutes of an orb spotted & recorded in Houston Texas
records.story: A report / video of 7 minutes of an orb spotted & recorded in Houston, Texas. Hello Peter Davenport,   I would like to report a red/orange orb that I recorded for approximately 7 minutes from around 2010.  I need a location to post these videos.  I have filled out numerous form on a plethora of sites with no response and I just heard your program on Jeff Rense from Friday November 20, 2015. I would like for the video to be available for your next program with Jeff & too see if those that have reported these orbs/fireballs are witnessing the same object if possible. The sky was pasty blue (would have been 'blue' if it were not for the chemtrail residue) with some large white clouds.  It was around 5:00 PM.  The winds were blowing from West to East and the orange red orb that I recorded was moving from East to West (so a Chinese lantern could be eliminated).  After moving to the West for about 2 (two) minutes, the object changed direction to North for about 5 (five) minutes. Once the orb stopped directly above me, it stay there for about 4 (minutes) at which time my neck became to sore to look straight up at. If you would like to view the videos please get back in touch with me. Thanks for your time. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Green light flashing then descending rapidly until out of sight.
records.story: Green light flashing then descending rapidly until out of site. 	During a walk around 11:40 pm I noticed a green light flashing in the sky.   I stopped to stare at the light and it appeared to be hovering in place.  The light then began to move to the left slightly still hovering.  The flashing of the light was at a constant rate similar to the flashing light of an aircraft at night.  The light began to move to the left again and the light disappeared.  The light then appeared again and the it hovered for a few seconds until the light started to descend rapidly.  After this the light was out of sight.

records.summary: There were bright neon color flashes, no sound, close to the ground, hard rain, all during a power outage.
records.story: There were bright neon color flashes, no sound, close to the ground, hard rain, all during a power outage. I saw 4/5 flashes of bright neon colors like orange, pink, yellow, and green.  It was very close to the ground, but in the gray night.  I couldn't take a picture and it lasted for about 7 seconds.  It had no sound.  Afterwards, it became very dark and I couldn't see anything. Then, 4/5 birds flew away and it kept raining a bit harder.  Also, during this time we had a power outage.  Soon after, the power came back on. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I was admiring how bright the moon rise tonight and at the corner of my eye I notice like a v-shaped boomerang black shape appear in th
records.story: I was admiring how bright the moon rise tonight and at the corner of my eye I notice like a v-shaped boomerang black shape appear in the sky and the with light circular things under it was like a greyish black smoke I want to see under it and it was going across the sky East I want to say like southeast and it was getting lower and lower with no lights

records.summary: Crescent shape craft with dim Amber light no sound
records.story: Crescent shape craft with dim Amber light no sound Saw object traveling north to south, crescent shape very dim light (Amber in color somewhat) - traveling at high rate of speed.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  We have amended the time, to reflect a nighttime sighting.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a traingle shaped object in the sky no lights but blended into the darkness like it was moving through water. Lasted few seconds
records.story: I saw a traingle shaped object in the sky no lights but blended into the darkness like it was moving through water.  Lasted few seconds before I lost sight of it.  Was invisble, but you could see the outline as it moved through the sky.  And it made no sound at all.

records.summary: ((HOAX??))  At Milby Park, near junction of 610and hwy.225. Extremely cold nite for Houston.
records.story: At Milby Park near junction of 610and hwy.225.  Extremely cold nite for Houston. Clear starlit nite. We parked & walked into park & lighted up a joint.  Some moments later I noticed a basketball sized orange light starting to manifest under a small oak tree.  I walked toward the thing curious if this was some sort of hoax.  I circled over&under it with a branch.  It floated. ((NUFORC Note:  The marijuana issue makes us wonder whether this may be a hoax.  In any event, the drug issue makes the report a low priority one.  PD))

records.summary: Red ball-like aircraft spotted from private aircraft.
records.story: Red ball-Like aircraft spotted from private aircraft.  I was flying in my airplane from California and just as we started our decline I looked out the window.  Maybe 50 yards from the wing of the plane was a red ball like orb flying.   It was traveling extremely fast then down shifted and zig zagged before it sped off extremely fast past the tail of the plane.  The ball looked maybe the size of a beach ball.   We were definitely too high in the air for it to be a balloon or drone, not to mention the very strange way it was flying, as if it was observing the airplane I was in. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Large transparent delta wing ufo; no lights, noise, condensation trail.  Speed slow enough to stall.
records.story: Large transparent delta wing ufo, no lights, noise, condensation trail.   Speed slow enough to stall. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Two aliens were in my backyard and I recorded the entire event.
records.story: Two aliens were in my backyard and I recorded the entire event. I think I recorded an alien or something not of this world on my iPad.  At first I thought it was a ghost or spirit but now I'm not sure.   It you watch the video you will see that it's not of this world. ((NUFORC Note:  We are awaiting a copy of the photo.  PD))

records.summary: Two narrow, black cigar shaped objects in the horizon that moved towards each other then away very slowly as if they were frozen.
records.story: Two narrow, black cigar shaped objects in the horizon that moved towards each other then away very slowly as if they were frozen. We saw two cigar shaped very thin objects in the distance just above the treeline at sunset.  At first, there appeared to be only one black object vertically in the sky stationary.  Another black thin cigar shaped object then appeared above it and stopped moving for a while before it began moving upward away from the first object and the first stationary object curved to the left and started moving slowly. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Green oval shaped orb with a small red light at the bottom hoovering over a tree lined cattle pasture.
records.story: A green oval shaped orb with a small red light at the bottom hoovering over a tree lined cattle pasture. On Monday, May 17, 2016, around 4:30am in Houston, Texas, I was headed home, traveling westbound on Airport Blvd. between Cullen Blvd and Scott St.  It was raining lightly at the time.    To my left there was a narrow strip of tree lined pasture where cattle graze.  Rising above the trees was a oval shaped green orb that was about 10-15 ft. wide.  At the bottom of the orb was a small red light.  The orb was moving back and forth over the trees.  Since I was the only one traveling on that stretch of the road, I dropped my speed to about 5mph.  I also rolled down my driver side window to get a better look.  I noted that there was no sound and no blinking lights coming from the orb, which made me realize that it was not a helicopter and definitely not an airplane.  I traveled down to the road to a break in the median and made a u-turn heading back towards the ufo.  That’s when it started flying off to the east, increased in speed and disappeared.

records.summary: I saw 3 lights in the sky that moved together.
records.story: I saw 3 lights in the sky that moved together. I was in the street in front of our home.  I was not alone but not near anyone to let them know.  What I saw was 3 lights that looked like dim stars.  But these 3 lights formed a triangle, 1 light in front and 2 to rear.  And the lights moved together.   I watched it move in a north direction, and then it turn to the west.  Almost in a 45 degree.  All lights turned at same time.  I remember it heading toward downtown Houston.  The light appeared to be high in the sky. I realize this is old and not important, but I wanted to let you know.   I could not see a craft but saw lights that moved in a uniform pattern. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Formation of 6 or 7 fireballs hovering in the sky above Sugarland, TX
records.story: Formation of 6 or 7 fireballs hovering in the sky above Sugarland, TX Heading south on highway 518 in Friendswood, we noticed a strange formation in the skies above Sugarland, or south west of us.  There were 6 or 7 hovering fireballs, moving slowly with tails.  Then they started to separate and disappear.  The last one standing appeared to have a red light hovering by it, maybe an airplane or chopper.  The objects were large and bright.  In all, the event looked to be a very large scale slow mo version of firework.  I have never seen anything like it, nor can explain what it was.

records.summary: Update to my report.
records.story: Update to my report. Yesterday, I reported seeing a diamond moving over my townhouse in Spring Branch, Texas (Houston),  I go upstairs and I started hearing jets.  I hear passenger jets all the time as I'm under a flight path but these were loud!  I call the dog and we go downstairs, as soon as i got to the same spot I daw saw the object, two fighter jets came flying by!  F-22 or F-16 and they were low and banking.  It made me feel weird as I have never seen that before, not in my neighborhood. I tried to record them but all I got was the sound of engine.     Something went down yesterday for sure.  Around the I-10 & Beltway 8 area I live a little NE of there.  There's a YouTube video fighter jets over Houston somebody else saw them. Thanks!

records.summary: We were in River Oaks at a stop light right by River Oaks movie theater. My husband and I were talking and were at a red light.
records.story: We were in river oaks at a stop light right by river oaks movie theater. My husband and I were talking and were at a red light.  Suddenly we saw something fall from the sky and it looked like it curved down, like rolled down the sky.  Across the houston skyline.  It was not a shooting star and we both gasped and said- did you just see that?  It was a ball of light, that literally, fell from right, tumbling down two left. And then it was gone less than two seconds.  I just noticed the light, but my husband says it had a green tint. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Houston, TX, sighting of strange lights and power/signal outage.
records.story: Houston, TX, sighting of strange lights and power/signal outage At 4:30am this morning, Oct 2, 2016, in Houston, TX, all cable signal was lost in the house which has never happened.  Soon after cable signal was lost, so was all the power on the block (walked outside).   After walking outside to inspect outage, in a clear sky we spotted an aqua green, translucent object moving slowly from a round to oval shape (looked, compared to a jellyfish without tentacles and size as to holding a quarter at arm's width away from face), traveling at un-constant rate of speed and direction, without making a sound.   We watched for 30-45 seconds then made a hard left and shot quickly out of sight.   Minutes after witnessing this and discussing with others that saw it, seemed to be military helicopter moving at a high rate of speed in the same direction as the strange light.   After object was out of sight all power and signal returned to normal.   From being in shock we didn’t get any pictures or footage.   There were four others than me that witnessed this sighting. Interested in finding out if anyone in the area seen the same or anything comparable to what we saw.

records.summary: Small bright diamond, exposed by the sun.
records.story: Small bright diamond, exposed by the sun. Was looking south, clear sky and the sun was exposing a small bright diamond.  I thought maybe plane at first but it wasn't.   It was a good clear sighting, it was moving south and sort of curving west.   It went over a large population, I'm sure it was seen by others.  Thanks! ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Witnessed three white lights in triangle formation move in the sky unlike any other "flying object."
records.story: Witnessed three white lights in triangle formation move in the sky unlike any other "flying object." First saw three white lights hovering about 50ft apart while driving down the road to a friend's apartment around 1 in the morning.  We then find somewhere to pull over and realize the lights are moving slowly.  Continue to observe until the lights eventually proceeded to accelerate away from each other while still maintaining the triangle shape until they were out of our field of vision.

records.summary: I was taking pictures of the sun getting ready to set. I took several pictures about 30 seconds apart. ((anonymous report))
records.story: I was taking pictures of the sun getting ready to set.  I took several pictures about 30 seconds apart.   When I returned inside to look at them; I noticed an object near the sun at its 10:00 position. I pinched zoomed on the object and was shocked to see some type of unknown object.  The sun is actually casting its light on the object from an angle it is from the sun. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect lens flares, caused by pointing a camera at a bright source of light.  We have not received the photos, so all we can do is guess.  The witness elects to remain anonymous, so we are unable to contact him/her.  PD))

records.summary: Bright, red circle of light with triangle on front moved over Houston in a north-south direction, then disappeared.
records.story: Bright, red circle of light with triangle on front moved over Houston in a north-south direction, then disappeared. We were driving home, and someone noticed a bright, red light in the sky.  After a few seconds, we all saw it.  It was a bright, red circle of light, with what looked like a triangle on the front.  It moved from north to south.   It was first spotted about 60 degrees up, towards south.  It then continued to move across the sky in a southwardly direction for about five minutes, until it reached about 30 degrees up.   It then disappeared, during the time it took to get from the front of the house to the back (we got home right before it disappeared).   It looked something a little like this:  "O>"…  i.e., a red circle, with a triangle on the front.

records.summary: First noticed a blue-green light in the sky.
records.story: Was standing outside in downtown houston at 8:25pm right before sunset on May 4, 2017. First noticed a blue-green light in the sky.  Small about the size of a pin point.  I thought it was a commercial plan but then it moved fast and then just stopped in the sky.  I saw the other end of it and it was fire orange like some type of vent.  It at times moved in the direction the vent was pointing.  Oposite of what normal craft do.  This object moved so smoothly across the sky at fast speeds, slowing down, stopping, changing direction and angle effortlessly.  It was taller from top to bottom than it was wide, no wings.  The best was to describe is it was like a fly just smoothly making all the changes in flight pattern.  I saw a commercial air craft in between me and it and could judge distances from sizes of plane and it.  Hair stood up on my neck and I was very scared for the first min when I realized this is not normal and nothing I have ever seen before.  And then a peaceful calm came over me and I just took in what I was seeing for next 30 sec.  I did not have my phone on me and did not want to leave to go get it.  For a second, I looked next to me to see if anyone else saw I looked back and it was completely gone except for some shiny particles specs of light that disappeared also in a second.  Amazing....!!!!!!!

records.story: At around midnight 11/05/2017, explosion sounds heard by families in homes in Harris County area.  News reported nothing whilst neighborhood website shows reports of sounds of war bombings, two witnesses reported seeing a flasing red light and moments later a flashing red light appearing to iluminate the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I stepped outside to look at the clear moonless sky. My location is 10 miles west of Intercontinental Airport Houston IAH. I have never
records.story: I stepped outside to look at the clear moonless sky.  My location is 10 miles west of Intercontinental Airport Houston IAH.  I have never before seen anything in the sky that looked strange, but I saw a V or triangle shaped greyish object with no sound or lights against a dark sky gliding pretty fast north to south, then turning southeast when directly over me.  It flew perfectly smoothly and was headed in the general direction of downtown Houston or Ellington Air Force Base about 25 miles away.  Its form was static like a plane and seemed to be gliding at a few hundred feet, or perhaps flying too high to hear.  At age 70 this was a first for me - I don't believe in extra-terrestial UFOs, but this was truly amazing to see.

records.summary: Triangle craft that glowed red.
records.story: Triangle craft that glowed red. Triangle craft with slightly curved edges.  The entire craft glowed red.  There was a yellow circle of lights underneath.  The craft hovered in the air above the tree line but below the clouds.  Unknown how large or distance from me.  Weather was cloudy, cold and with occasional rain.  Observed from inside the house at night with tree branches partially blocking the view.  Observed for about three seconds, then went outside to film but craft was gone.
