records.summary: Bright white sphere high in the morning sky, illuminating light grows in size, then vanishes in an instant.
records.story: Bright white sphere high in the morning sky, illuminating light grows in size, then vanishes in an instant. I was traveling to work along Beltway 8 East in Houston, TX, this morning, Friday, 9/8/17, at 8:45am, and noticed an extremely bright light high in the clear blue sky.  The illuminating light was spherical and grew in size, somewhat changing shape, then decreased in size, then completely disappeared in an instance.  It did this three times within a period of 3 minutes or less.  It definitely was not an airplane; there was never any definite shape that formed, no white trail of smoke, no clouds around it, no sound (though it was very high in the sky).  I called my husband immediately to share what I had seen, as I was perplexed as to what it could be and very excited, it sounded like other UFO sightings I’ve heard described.   I’m trying to find out if there are other local reports of people witnessing the same thing.

records.summary: Up close twinkling  stationary white lights flashing red & green.
records.story: Up close twinkling  stationary white lights flashing red & green. Looking out door, noticed a bright twinkling white light.  Too large and close to be a star, then noticed flashes of red and green.  Object was stationery.Used binouclars for better look.  There was 1 large white light with several smaller white lights clustered around it with flashing red & green.  Not a plane, after 20 min it slowly began to rise up.  I saw it as rose from the bottom of electric wire line to star level.  Stopped watching after an hr or so.

records.summary: Large bright white disk flew quickly across my house in seconds silently.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: Large bright white disk flew quickly across my house in seconds silently Was flying my drone and getting ready to land when I saw a large bright white disk above the cloud tops.  I live near an airport so I am used to the usual characteristics of aircraft but this craft flew from one side of the sky to next in 5 seconds max and it was also silent.   It had consistent white lighting across the body with no other distinguishable lights or features.  It was comparable in size to the moon except it was flying fast and not stopping.  I am currently a graduate student in mechanical engineering, and have specialized in the study of fluid mechanics. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Black isosceles triangle with six large, faded lights around the inside of its outline and the inside of all three corners and another
records.story: Black isosceles triangle with six large, faded lights around the inside of its outline and the inside of all three corners and another said light in the center.  Smaller isosceles triangle outline closing off center light from other lights.  Hard to discern because color almost matched with sky in nighttime, and distance from Earth’s surface gave appearance of size of small vending machine toy.

records.summary: He stopped @ the end of my driveway,,, and said, "Those bright light are not moving."
records.story: My neighbor walked out of my home after an evening of fellowship,,,, as we were saying our "good-nights"; he stopped @ t My neighbor walked out of my home after an evening of fellowship,,,, as we were saying our "good-nights"  he stopped @ the end of my driveway,,, and said "those bright light are not moving".   I joined him and said it must be a helicopter.  His reply was "they do not go that high".  I asked ((male name deleted)) if he had any field glasses, he said yes and we both went to retrieve them,,,, meeting back within min's @ his driveway. What we both noticed was a cluster of bright powerful lights coming from the S/SW of Houston with the object not moving,,,,but, there was a small cluster of lights moving away in an westerly direction and from time to time return to the large cluster of bright lights.    The sky was clear w/o any clouds in the sky.  With him having serviced in the Air Force and I in the MARINES we both thought that the object was much higher than a military aircraft, or a commercial airliner, would be flying…

records.summary: Ufos that mimic planes everyday occurrence now.
records.story: Ufos that mimic planes everyday occurrence now. My oldest sons, 18 and 19, are the ones who recorded this time.  They were not sure if it was a plane or not.  But it obviously isn't.  Above my mothers house every night after 23:00 hours they come out the most.  But I see them all day as planes.  Like a hologram with a sound put out.  But it changes shapes to fast and follows us.

records.summary: Saw a red/orange spinning wheel object ascending and then vanish into cloud bank.
records.story: Saw a red/orange spinning wheel object ascending and then vanish into cloud bank. Mid-Day - Bright Sun Saw what appeared to be a wheel looking object spinning and ascending over in the direction of Hwy Loop 610 and Memorial/San Felipe area (I am about 6 miles from that area).  Object appeared to be red/orange.  Object slowly ascending, spinning from top to bottom, rotating like a wheel on a car..  had a slight wobble to it as well.  Object ascended in an arc, and then when it got to a cloud bank, clouds started to move toward the object slowly and then the object was no longer in sight.  Waited to see if the object would emerge from the other side of the cloud bank but it did not.  Clouds stopped moving once object entered the cloud bank.

records.summary: Good evening. At about 7:28 PM, I was driving on US 90/ Main St. from the Stafford area, driving North East direction towards NRG Stadi
records.story: Good evening. At about 7:28 PM, I was driving on US 90/ Main St. from the Stafford area, driving North East direction towards NRG Stadium area. Driving on US 90/Main st., I was approaching my exit (Hillcroft St.).  There was light rain which started at this time. Lightning flashed through the sky, North East, visually right in the sky in front of me. Before approaching the lane to exist from US 90/Main St. towards the North East direction towards Hillcroft St., the lit up sky (from the lightning) revealed a bright sky, as well as a miles wide Unidentified Aerial Phenomena /UFO hovering still seemingly over the NRG Stadium/Downtown area.  It was close to the ground. For perspective for distances / sizes:  When we see a commercial plane flying above the clothes, it looks like a small centimeter from our visual perspective on the ground typically. And we can visually see that the plane is flying through and over the clouds.  This UAP/UFO was visually hovering within the clouds directly above the NRG Stadium/Downtown area, visually being miles wide in length.  I cannot assume the exact miles but it looked like it covered at least 3 miles in length.  This object was clearly and precisely shown and revealed as the lightning lit up the sky behind the object, therefore revealing the object hovering directly in front of the light in my view.  This object was grey/black in color, perfectly shaded except for the, kind of transparent, clouds hovering around it.  This object was perfectly shaped as a short top hat. The UAP/UFO looked to be several cruise ships wide.  It was in my sight for about 2 seconds.  There was a blueish/grey haze around the object, but I'm not sure what it was coming from.

records.summary: What is the bright orange object, in Houston’s western sky tonight, around 7:00pm?  I was taking a walk and saw it streaking towards th
records.story: What is the bright orange object, in Houston’s western sky tonight, around 7:00pm?  I was taking a walk and saw it streaking towards the earth like a comet, only not as fast.  Then it ceased to continue streaking downward, and the entire ‘design’ of fireball with vertical streaks above it, started to fade in brightness and visibility. At first I wondered if a plane was crashing, but there was no sound.  Except for the color, I would have guessed it was a far-away jet, only it was heading directly downward.  I came in the house to Google and find out what it is before it had disappeared entirely.  I didn’t find anything online.  I wondered if there was a satellite or something due to fall to the ocean today.  But then, it never finished falling before it started to fade.

records.summary: I was about 7 years old and my brother was 8 years old.my uncle and I were sitting on the front porch eating popsicles and my brother s
records.story: I was about 7 years old and my brother was 8 years old.  my uncle and I were sitting on the front porch eating popsicles and my brother started screaming and yelling and pointing to the sky, "look, look, look,..." I looked at and saw a large craft, that if I open my arms and put it in the air in a v shape, it would show about a five mile wide or possibly ten mile wide craft.  It seemed to be about 5 to 800 feet off the ground and hovered there for about 5 minute. I noticed all the clouds around it and the blue in the sky and the skin of The Craft seem to be like the mother of pearl on a clamshell.  It seemed to move with an iridescent and had a dark tone to it and yet a silverish iridescents to it.  It was the largest object that ever seen the sky and I was quite stunned it wasn't sure what I was looking at. It shot off into the West sky as fast as lightning and I tried to follow it but was too fast.  And then a brite pink color filled the sky and flashed across the whole horizon.  It seemed like I could taste or even hear the color.  Was very bizarre for my young mind and I was trying to figure it all out, when my uncle suddenly jerk me up by the arm and rushed me and my brother into the house and deadbolt the door and latch the chain and was peering out the window on the door. My uncle what it was and he sternly told me,"Shhh! Be quiet, don't say anything!!! He then told me to go sit down in the living room and don't say anything to anybody about it. I knew what I had seen was out of the ordinary and I didn't understand exactly what it was oh, but I knew that it was something not from this planet. My intuition told my young mind that it was from somewhere else.
